Name: Requiring notification of the departments of buildings, housing preservation and development,  environmental protection, and health and mental hygiene whenever the fire department responds to a structural fire.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notification of the departments of buildings, housing preservation and development,  environmental protection, and health and mental hygiene whenever the fire department responds to a structural fire, requiring the fire department to assess the damage after any structural fire, and requiring the establishment of guidelines to determine when other agencies are required to provide services after structural fires
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management
